note:
I am a humanist, atheist, and free-thinker, and I believe in using reason and evidence to understand the world around us. I am passionate about science and its ability to improve our lives and the world we live in.

In my free time, I enjoy spending quality time with my wife and kids and figuring out ways to be a better human being.

I am the owner and operator of Fusion Development, LLC a tech company based out of Lexington, KY in the U.S.
